channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The global economy will be hit hard by Trump's tariffs, IMF warns
item.description: The International Monetary Fund slashed its growth forecasts for the global economy to 2.8% as President Trump's tariffs risk sparking a trade war.

item.title: Trump fires more immigration judges even as he aims to increase deportations
item.description: Getting rid of judges adds to criticism of the Trump administration for not giving migrants or noncitizens enough due process before they're deported.

item.title: Anti-Defamation League says anger at Israel is now the driving force behind antisemitism in the US
item.description: The Anti-Defamation League says the number of antisemitic incidents in the United States reached a record high last year.
